items.text: short of a length on leg stump, tapped to square leg off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length on off stump, tapped on the up to mid-off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, stabs at it and is beaten
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, leans in and flicks to midwicket's left
items.postText: afif ahmed: "It would show Afghans temperament to chase down this total. Mind you, Bangladesh has strengthened the bowling with the inclusion of spinner Nazmul Islam . And fizz with his cutters will be good in this pitch. "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket with the turn
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: another lbw appeal turned down. Short ball keeps low as he looks to pull and hits him on the back leg, but the bowler is bowling around the wicket and it has pitched outside leg
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: length on middle, punched to long-on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler on the up
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length ball into the corridor, tapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: length on off stump, punched to long-off
items.postText: Abhijato: "Correction: Shahzad is still playing and not out as it's saying on main page." --- Oops. We're sorting that, thanks.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, pushed through flat and he hurriedly drives back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven cleanly to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length ball pushed flat at middle stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
items.postText: Jay: "48 dot balls in powerplay for Afgan, totally not a good sign of cricket. "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, backs away and mistimes the cut
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: length ball on leg stump. Allows it to come on and tickles it fine
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, chopped straight to point
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short outside off, cut to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, punched with the turn to long-on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: short of a length in the corridor, backs away and is beaten as he looks to cut

items.text: length outside off, steps out and stabs it past extra cover with the turn
